organizations.name: Conservative Research Department
quotes: However, the newspaper reported that Cameron's then superior at Conservative Research Department called the trip 'jolly', saying that 'it was all terribly relaxed, just a little treat, a perk of the job. organizations.name: National Union of Students
quotes: Wes Streeting, then president of the National Union of Students, said: 'The message that the Conservatives are sending to the majority of students is that if you didn't go to a university attended by members of the Shadow Cabinet, they don't believe you're worth as much.'
